notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by grants from the National Natural Science Foundation of China (81401678 and 81601778), the Research Foundation of the Capital Institute of Pediatrics (FX-2019-05),Â National Science and Technology Major Project (2018ZX10101-003-002), and the Special Fund of the Pediatric Medical Coordinated Development Center of the Beijing Municipal Administration of Hospitals (XTZD20180505). The funders had no role in the study design, data collection and interpretation or the decision to submit the work for publication.
